name: Divine Reign
description:
You are a divine being who is responsible for your followers well being. Build up their village to maintain their happiness and for their survival.

There are three different game modes each with their own goals. Be a merciful god and lead your followers to victory.

Inspired from city simulation games Divine Reign allows you to construct a live town full of a vibrant populous.

As a god you can perform miracles to keep your villagers alive and happy. You are powered by your followers devotion to you so be sure to keep them happy.
